headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Air Races and Flight School Activities Rewards
content:
Some contests can only be settled at elevated altitudes. Take flight high above (or just barely above) the city of Los Santos this week in Rockstar Created Air Races. Daring pilots of all stripes will earn 3X GTA$ and RP for competing, win or lose, all week long.

Pilotry is an art like any other: practice makes perfect. Intrepid students and experienced airmen and women will earn 2X GTA$ and RP on all Flight School activities and exercises.
